Name: Transaction Set Purpose Code
Notes: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

Name: Transaction Type Code
Notes: Code specifying the type of transaction

Name: Date
Remarks: BR03 is the date of the transaction set preparation.

Name: Identification Code
Notes: Code identifying a party or other code

Name: Identification Code Qualifier
Notes: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)
Remarks: C0504: If BR-05 is present, then BR-04 is required

Name: Reference Identification Qualifier
Remarks: P0708: If either BR-07 or BR-08 is present, then the other is required

Name: Reference Identification
Notes: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Name: Time
Notes: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)
Remarks: BR09 is the time of the transaction set preparation

Name: Reference Identification Qualifier
Remarks: P1011: If either BR-10 or BR-11 is present, then the other is required

Name: Reference Identification
Notes: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier
